page.title: 11THE CALENDAR OF LEIGH SINTON
page.content: JANUARY:Village Hall Pantomime.Organ- ized by the village hall committee, most of whom take part,most of the children from the schools in the area go to see it. MAY:Country and Western evening.These take place about 2/3 times a year in Wenden's barn. JUNE:School Fete.This year the theme was the Centenary and a Victorian Summer Fayre took place on Guinness Field. AUGUST:Leigh and Bransford Folk Fair. This takes place on the Memorial Hall Field. OCTOBER:Harvest Festival Auction held at the Royal Oak.Proceeds donated to charity. DECEMBER:The local Hunt calls at the Royal Oak before setting off.Many regular Christmas celebrations all over the village.
